thread.title: BRIEF-China E-Wallet Payment Group's Unit Enters Letter Of Intent For Proposed XHP Group Purchase

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China E-Wallet Payment Group's Unit Enters Letter Of Intent For Proposed XHP Group Purchase

organizations.name: brief-china e-wallet payment group's unit enters letter of intent for proposed xhp group purchase
reuters) - china e-wallet payment group ltd

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - China E-Wallet Payment Group Ltd :
* UNIT ENTERS LETTER OF INTENT WITH GLOBAL DIGITAL CURRENCY TRANSACTION FOR PROPOSED PURCHASE OF BUSINESS WITH XHP GROUP Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
